In Paris, most of the luxury hotels are located on the Right Bank.
One on the Left Bank and the most famous one...
...is called the Lutetia and it was the first Art Deco hotel in Paris.
It was inaugurated in December 1910 and it has a long and interesting history.
It was the Gestapo headquarters during World War II...
...and then it became the place where the camp refugees were put in transits,...
...while the authorities were looking for their families right after the war.
